channel.title: Comments on: Boyz n tha Hood
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: ljedi
item.dc:creator: ljedi
item.description: I think I would be traumatized for life if I saw somebody get really hurt like that. I like my violence fake. I hope you're ok.
item.content:encoded: I think I would be traumatized for life if I saw somebody get really hurt like that. I like my violence fake. I hope you’re ok.

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description: Holy crap. Even as a ten-year addict to Law & Order, I still don't think I envy you that experience. I hope something you remember leads to getting the bad guys.
item.content:encoded: Holy crap. Even as a ten-year addict to Law & Order, I still don’t think I envy you that experience. I hope something you remember leads to getting the bad guys.
